    Part of campskeleton: http://code.google.com/p/campskeleton/ Original Copyright Notice: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 A bunch of faces that collide at the same height

      • process

        public boolean process(Skeleton skel)
        This is a bit of quest! Assumption is that there are no parallel edges creating horizontal bisectors in the current loops. We create some here, then process them all, again removing all horizontal bisectors from the current loops.
        Specified by:
        process in interface HeightEvent
        Returns:
        true if topology has changed, false (we ignored all events)

      • processHoriz

        public void processHoriz(Skeleton skel)
        Process horizontals. assumes that all corners with horizontal bisectors are at the same height(?), and that all faces that need to be merged, have been.
        Parameters:
        skel -
